edu.rpi.tw.data.rdf.utils.pipes.starts

Class Cat

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rpi.tw.data.rdf.utils.pipes.starts.Cat

  • public class Cat
extends java.lang.Object
    Accept a series of file pathnames and URLs of RDF files, concatenate them into a single model, and print to sysout. Strip all named graph designations that may be specified in trig and trix files. Inspired by jena.rdfcopy, but it cannot handle trig named graph designations. TODO: varargs for file could be used as a cat, which would do part of PlusMinus's job. Cat my.rdf reads my.rdf as rdf/xml and outputs as rdf/xml Cat my.blah reads my.blah as rdf/xml and outputs as rdf/xml Cat my.ttl rdf/xml reads my.ttl as turtle and outputs as rdf/xml Cat my.nt ttl reads my.nt as n-triples and outputs as turtle Cat - rdf/xml ttl reads stdin as rdf/xml and outputs as turtle Cat - rdf/xml nt my.ttl other.ttl concatenates stdin (as rdf/xml), my.ttl (as turtle) and other.ttl (as turtle); outputs as n-triples
